thread.title: Kerry Katona's estranged husband George Kay charged with assaulting her
thread.title_full: Kerry Katona's estranged husband George Kay charged with assaulting her

title: Kerry Katona's estranged husband George Kay charged with assaulting her
text:
Kerry Katona's estranged husband George Kay charged with assaulting her Kerry Katona's estranged husband George Kay charged with assaulting her 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
The estranged husband of TV reality star and former singer Kerry Katona has been charged with allegedly assaulting her and possessing a prohibited weapon. 
George Kay, 35, was arrested following the alleged incident at the couple’s home in Crowborough, East, Sussex, on October 3. 
The weapon charge relates to a taser-style weapon disguised as a torch. (Rex) 
He answered bail at the weekend and will appear at Brighton Magistrates’ Court on November 26. 
A Sussex Police spokesman said: “Just after 6pm on Saturday, October 3, police were called to an address in Gorsedene Close to a report that a 35-year-old woman had allegedly been assaulted. Share article 
“George Kay, 35, a labourer of Hollybank Moore, Warrington, answered bail on Saturday evening (October 24) and was charged with assault by beating and possession of a prohibited weapon.” Promoted Stories
